      • sendDatagram

        public void sendDatagram​(BubblegumNode localNode,
                         RouterNode node,
                         BgKademliaMessage.KademliaMessage payload,
                         java.util.function.Consumer<BgKademliaMessage.KademliaMessage> callback)
        General purpose DHT network sending function.
        Parameters:
        localNode - The local node responsible for this transmission.
        node - The node instance the send the payload to.
        payload - The payload to be transmitted.
        callback - A callback function to be triggered when a response with the same exchange ID is received. May be null.
